io.dropwizard.metrics.kafka.serialization

Class JSONByteArraySerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.dropwizard.metrics.kafka.serialization.JSONStringSerializer
      • io.dropwizard.metrics.kafka.serialization.JSONByteArraySerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KafkaMetricsSerializer

    public class JSONByteArraySerializer
extends JSONStringSerializer
    As per JSONStringSerializer but returning byte encoded ProducerRecords. The mapping from metric to message is the same as is the message content. These classes only differ in the encoding used for the returned ProducerRecord instances.

    Use the one which matches your Kafka serializer.

    • Method Detail

      • metricRecord

        protected org.apache.kafka.clients.producer.ProducerRecord<?,?> metricRecord(String topic,
                                                                             String key,
                                                                             String value)
        Description copied from class: JSONStringSerializer
        Performs the actual encoding of the JSON data into a ProducerRecord.

        Sub classes can override this method to produce messages in different formats without concerning themselves with the conversion of the metrics into JSON documents. (As JSONByteArraySerializer does.)

        Overrides:
        metricRecord in class JSONStringSerializer
        Parameters:
        topic - the topic to which the message will be posted
        key - the key of the message
        value - the JSON formatted metric value
        Returns:
        a Kafka ProducerRecord
